site_name: Gainsborough CourtCollege RoadLondonSouthwarkSE21 7LT
description: Works to trees with a TPO: - 3x Common Ash (4238, 4240, 4244), 1x Himalayan Birch (4269), 2x Downy Birch (4266, 4397), 1 x Pedunculate Oak (4399), 2x Common Lime (4400, 4401), 1x Field Maple (4293), Red Oak (4404): Remove major deadwood.- 1x Horse Chestnut (4141): Reduce to previous pruning points.- 1x White Poplar (4411): Reduce height to 2m above original pollard point.- 1x White Poplar (4412): Reduce height to 1m above original pollard point. - 1x Pedunculate Oak (4109):  End weight reduction of both secondary limbs above hazard beam crack in SE canopy at 7.5m. 2-3m from lower secondary limb and 1-2m from the smaller upper limb. Also remove major deadwood. Sever and remove ivy from 0-100cm above ground level. - 1x False Acacia (4234): Remove major deadwood. Sever and remove ivy from 0-100cm above ground level.- 1x Manna Ash (4241): Remove single dead limb at 4m over road.- 1x Common Ash (4243): End weight reduction of 2x long southern primary limbs in lower canopy by 2-3m. Remove major deadwood.- 1x Downy Birch (4396): Raise low canopy over footpath to 2.5m. Reduce back to closest growth points.- 2x Common Lime (4400, 4401): Remove all basal sucker and epicormic growth from ground level to 2.5m.- 1x Copper Beech (4403): Remove major deadwood and lower decaying primary limb. Also prune to clear building by 1.5m. Prune to suitable sublateral growth. - 1x Cherry Plum (5693): Prune to clear building by 1.5m. Prune back to suitable sublateral growth.- 1x Norway Maple (4413): Reduce canopy by 1-2m and to clear building by 2m. Prune back suitable sublateral growth.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
